scriptedEmail.name: Blog Confirm Subscription
scriptedEmail.description: Sends a confirmation email when an anonymous user subscribes to a blog.
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Confirm">Please {confirm_link} to {blog_name_link}.</resource> <resource name="Body_Disregard">If you did not request this subscription or for whatever reason decide you do not wish to receive email notifications about {blog_name_link}, please just disregard this email.</resource> <resource name="Confirm">confirm your subscription</resource> <resource name="Subject">{blog_name}: Subscription Confirmation</resource> <resource name="Header">Subscription Confirmation</resource> </language>
